cotrollers

类 QueryDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • cotrollers.QueryDatabase
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Query
    直接已知子类:
    loadWebSource

    public class QueryDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
implements Query
    a class for query information from database

    it provide seven method to query, by date ,magnitude, region and their combination

    作者:
    Huang Yu'an

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      private static java.lang.String comDate 
      private static java.lang.String comMag

      private java.sql.ResultSet res 

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      QueryDatabase(loadCNF cnf)
      a constructor for load information from a configuration file the configuration file contains the model(csv,db,net) of loading data and the path of file which stores data

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法

      void queryArea(java.lang.String area1, java.lang.String area2)
      query information by region
      void queryDA(java.lang.String date1, java.lang.String date2, java.lang.String area1, java.lang.String area2)
      query information by date and magnitude
      void queryDAM(java.lang.String date1, java.lang.String date2, double low, double up, java.lang.String area1, java.lang.String area2)
      query information by date, magnitude and region
      void queryDate(java.lang.String date1, java.lang.String date2)
      query information by date
      void queryDM(java.lang.String date1, java.lang.String date2, double low, double up)
      query information by date and magnitude
      void queryMA(double low, double up, java.lang.String area1, java.lang.String area2)
      query information by magnitude and region

      query information by magnitude

    • 构造器详细资料

      • QueryDatabase

        public QueryDatabase(loadCNF cnf)
        a constructor for load information from a configuration file

        the configuration file contains the model(csv,db,net) of loading data and the path of file which stores data

        参数:
        cnf - a object that will load the configuration file

    • 方法详细资料

      • getRes

        result set res

      • queryDate

        public void queryDate(java.lang.String date1,
                      java.lang.String date2)
        query information by date
        参数:
        date1 - a data earlier
        date2 - a data later

      • queryMag

        public void queryMag(double low,
                     double up)
        query information by magnitude
        参数:
        low - a number from lower magnitude
        up - a number from higher magnitude

      • queryArea

        public void queryArea(java.lang.String area1,
                      java.lang.String area2)
        query information by region
        参数:
        area1 - a String from one area
        area2 - a String from another area
